name: Protest Protector
description:
Join Chandler Washington as he grabs supplies such as water bottles, energy bars, and face masks to protect himself and other protestors at the Black Lives Matter protest. Created for Black Lives Matter Game Jam, 2020.

Credits:

Ashley Poprik - Writer and Designer

Cindy Pham - Programmer and UI

Denzell Ford - Programmer and Sound FX

Melody Geiger - Artist

Donald Harris - Mentor

Jabari Alii - Mentor
